title: Çigköftem Snack Bar - Mannheim
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish
description: Fast food franchise offering primarily a vegan and vegetable pate made of grains, walnut, tomato puree, sunflower oil, parsley, and green onion, which are formed into little balls or fingers and place inside wraps or on mixed plates. Main product is vegan köfte. Non-vegan is yogurt.
